segments.text: I observe the woman’s focus on that plate; it’s as if she’s in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water spills over the sink and my stomach churns at the sight of the puddle forming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so unaware of the chaos brewing in her kitchen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks so determined, but I can’t help but think how reckless his actions are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And what about the girl? She stands by eagerly waiting, joy shining in her expression.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment feels like a ticking time bomb; chaos is just a breath away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope they all stay safe despite the trouble they’re inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR
